column4: Latest;Phnom Penh: Por Senchey District police visited a place producing samurai swords
column5: swords and  knives and temporarily closing it down.------The operation was conducted at 10 am on June 15
column6: 2019 at a sword-making enterprise in Chamkar Ovalek 2
column8: Khan Por Senchey.------Police said that local people had reported the location
column9: so they went to check and found hundreds of swords of all kinds.------According to the production workers
column10: these sword knives were manufactured and exported abroad.------However
column11: authorities say the business was not known to authorities
column12: so they confiscated hundreds of knives and swords to be temporarily stored pending further inquiries.------http://nokorwatnews.com/archives/419374
